title: Full screen, Borderless?
body:
So After the new 9.7 Patch Update Maintenance, I played {{champion:498}}  and {{champion:497}}  my friend... well that's not important. After champion select, my champion loading screen became really weird, continued happen throughout the game- it wasn't full screen. (I chose borderless since i have a mac and can switch desktops) I can't describe it so here's a picture:[ http://imgur.com/a/OzySr ](http://imgur.com/a/OzySr )
Ignore the white stuff pls if there is any
(I know it's {{champion:22}} the picture but i wanted to screenshot what happened)
If this helps, Im using a Macbook pro 13-inch
I played league for a year, and this never happened until now.. What's going on?
I don't want to play fullscreen because sometimes I wanna check Skype, go on Chrome ETC but with fullscreen I can't switch screens...
Please Help...

replies.body: I am having the exact same issue. I use a mac and have chosen borderless to be able to switch desktop screens. Since the 7.9 patch, the borderless no longer stretches the full length of the screen.
thank god i'm not the only one

Thanks for the screenshot and letting us know about this.  I've seen quite a few issues reported this morning for mac users, and I'm not totally sure what's going on yet.  There's a lot of good info here though!  To help troubleshoot this a bit, I'm curious if your config settings might be the cause of the screen no longer stretching.  To help rule out that possibility, try out config reset on your mac to restore your settings and in-game resolution to default:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761934-Mouse-and-Keyboard-Issues#mq2

Let me know if this helps!
Did you figure out how to fix this?
I've tried this and it still doesn't work, the game doesn't take up the full 1440x900 resolution screen

I read this new thing you guys posted on the league league status:
We are aware of players experiencing crashing during game start. While we are working on a permanent fix please use the following workaround. Locate the game.cfg file in \Riot Games\League of Legends\Config, open the file and edit WindowMode=0 to WindowMode=1, and then save the game.cfg file.

but I can't open the file.. what do I do?
if you locate the league of legends file right click on it and go to package contents. Then locate the LoL folder and then  Config folder. Open the game.cfg file with TextEdit!
I am not OP ofc, but I have done what you said and it didn't work. Tried changing resolutions through game.cf and still nothing.

I am having the same issues. I use borderless because I sometimes need to click on my desktop to get my mouse to work and then go back to the game, but this makes it so much harder too do since I'm forced to play in full screen.

Guys I contacted a Rioter by issuing a ticket and they say that it was intentional because of a Mac Hot Corner functionality issue. Hence, they will try to get borderless back to it's original functionality. However, this has been going on since patch 7.9 and I am very desperate for the fix.
I'm having the same problem this has never happened before until now. Has anyone found a way to fix the problem yet?
I am still having this issue as well. Anyway to fix yet?
I am still having this problem. is there any fix in sight?

I am having the same issue as well. I can't even use fullscreen because if i tab out, it makes my entire computer go to a black screen and my only option is to restart my computer. Please fix this so i can use borderless again. Thanks. Also, fix the USB mouse issue for OS Sierra. Thanks :)
I'm also having the same issue, with a macbook pro 15 inch 2016 w/ touch bar.
Also having the same issues on my mac, please advise...
